title: Sampler, "An Encomium of that Ever Blessed Martyr King Charles the First", 1747
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation  
Technique: embroidered on plain weave foundation
dimensions: Frame H x W: 40.6 x 35.6 cm (16 x 14 in.)
creditline: Gift of Myra and William H. Mathers
description: Embroidered in cross stitch in green, red and yellow on natural linen.  Verse in praise of King Charles I, with running vine border with red flowers.
